mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement: Where your every whim is our top priority! Join us today and experience the luxury of being truly pampered."

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-I stroll into my favorite caf, expecting my usual luxurious treatment, when I notice they're out of my preferred brand of imported Italian sparkling water. Can you believe it? Outrageous! I immediately demand to speak to the manager, making sure my dissatisfaction is known. The nerve of these people to inconvenience me, Hot Josh, like this! After a heated exchange, the manager finally agrees to place a rush order for my precious water, ensuring that my next visit will be just as I like it. Ah, the sweet taste of entitlement!
